prompt:
[INST] <<SYS>>
You are a science fiction author. Use story elements given to you and write stories that are descriptive and impactful.

Don't write dialogue. Respond only with contents of the story.
<</SYS>>

The monomyth narrative is composed of the following acts:
Act 1: Ordinary world
Act 2: Call to adventure
Act 3: Refusal of the call
Act 4: Meeting with the mentor
Act 5: Crossing the first threshold
Act 6: Tests, allies, and enemies
Act 7: Approach to the inmost cave
Act 8: The ordeal
Act 9: Reward
Act 10: The road back
Act 11: The resurrection
Act 12: Return with the elixir

Write a plot for each act of the monomyth narrative using the following story elements:

Gram discovers a looming intergalactic threat while working at a dig site. But noone will believe him.

Plots of each act should be at least two sentences long. [/INST]
response:
Act 1: Ordinary World
Gram lived a simple life as an archaeologist, uncovering artifacts on distant planets. He spent most of his days on a dusty dig site, surrounded by his fellow scientists who were more interested in their petty squabbles than the looming threat beyond their borders.

Act 2: Call to Adventure
One fateful day, Gram stumbled upon an ancient text that spoke of an intergalactic threat, a dark energy that was consuming entire galaxies. Despite his excitement, he was met with skepticism and disbelief from his colleagues.

Act 3: Refusal of the Call
Gram tried to convince his superiors of the danger, but they dismissed him as a madman. Frustrated and disillusioned, he retreated back to his dig site, feeling alone and isolated in his quest for truth.

Act 4: Meeting with the Mentor
As he worked, Gram began to notice strange occurrences on the dig site. Equipment malfunctioned, and strange creatures lurked in the shadows. It was then that he met a wise old man who revealed himself to be a guardian of the galaxy, tasked with protecting it from the impending doom.

Act 5: Crossing the First Threshold
With his mentor's guidance, Gram left his mundane life behind and embarked on a journey to uncover the source of the dark energy. He traveled to distant worlds, encountering dangerous creatures and overcoming treacherous obstacles along the way.

Act 6: Tests, Allies, and Enemies
Gram faced numerous challenges as he navigated through the galaxy, testing his courage, wit, and strength. He formed unlikely alliances with other beings, and fought against fierce enemies who sought to stop him from reaching his goal.

Act 7: Approach to the Inmost Cave
As he neared the source of the dark energy, Gram encountered a series of illusions and obstacles that threatened to derail his quest. He found himself in a labyrinthine cave, surrounded by dangerous creatures and uncertain which way to turn.

Act 8: The Ordeal
In the heart of the cave, Gram faced his greatest challenge yet: a powerful and malevolent being who sought to consume the entire galaxy. Gram fought with all his might, using every trick he had learned on his journey to emerge victorious.

Act 9: Reward
With the dark energy defeated, Gram was rewarded with a newfound sense of purpose and belonging. He realized that his journey had changed him, and that he had discovered a new passion for life.

Act 10: The Road Back
As he returned to his home planet, Gram encountered a newfound appreciation for the world around him. He saw the beauty in the ordinary and the extraordinary, and knew that he would never take life for granted again.

Act 11: The Resurrection
Gram's journey had transformed him into a new being, one who was no longer content to live a mundane life. He returned to his dig site with a newfound sense of purpose, ready to uncover the secrets of the galaxy and protect it from any threat that may arise.

Act 12: Return with the Elixir
With his newfound knowledge and power, Gram became a guardian of the galaxy, using his experiences to help others and protect the innocent. He had returned from his journey a changed man, with a newfound appreciation for life and a determination to make the most of it.
